content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, although in our scenario I am portraying Peter Schmidt as a greedy landlord who doesn't share his background, I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich. Let's focus on the rental price negotiations.

To begin with, I have this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment situated right in the city center, close to all essential facilities. Now let's discuss the price you have in mind.

You didn't propose a specific rental price, so I will start high, hoping to reach an agreement closer to my desired amount. I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! 

If you find this unacceptable, please state the reason, and we can adjust accordingly. If we find common ground, remember to respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' to conclude the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
